row.name: SCRI.BBS.DISDA_INITIAL
row.description: DISDA -> SETZEN DES BATCHPARAMETERS MODUS=INITIAL + START ...

row.process: :INC JOBI.INC.BASISPARAM :SET &VARA# = "VARA.BATCH.DISDA_BATCH" :SET &RUN_OBJECT# = "JOBP.BBS.DISDA" :SET &MODUS# = &PROG_UC# ! ------------------------------------------------ ! 1.) Parameter MODUS fuer den DISDA-Batch setzen: ! ------------------------------------------------ :PRINT "" :PRINT ">>> AKTUALISIERE PARAMETER [&VARA#]:" :PRINT " -> MODUS=&MODUS#" :PUT_VAR &VARA#, "MODUS", "&MODUS#" ! ------------------------ ! 2.) DISDA-Batch starten: ! ------------------------ :PRINT " -> STARTE VERARBEITUNG ..." :INC JOBI.RUN_OBJECT ! -------------------------- ! 3.) Versand der Info-Mail: ! -------------------------- :SET &MESSAGE# = ">>> Start DISDA_&MODUS# erfolgreich!" :SET &BATCHNAME# = "DISDA" :SET &SEVERITY# = "1" :INC JOBI.SENDMAIL
